## ReasonParams interface

A parameter builder interface indicating the reason the handler was called.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReasonParams<GReason = ExitReason | ChangeReason> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [reason](./prosemirror-suggest.reasonparams.reason.md) | <code>GReason</code> | The reason this callback was triggered. This can be used to determine the action to use in your own code. |
